def.dt: :any of various monocotyledonous plants with long ensiform leaves: as
:iris
:a wild iris
:sweet flag

entry.et: probably akin to fag end of cloth fag end

def.dt: :a usually rectangular piece of fabric of distinctive design that is used as a symbol (as of a nation), as a signaling device, or as a decoration
:the tail of some dogs (as a setter or hound)
:the long hair fringing a dog's tail
:the tail of a deer
:something used like a flag to signal or attract attention
:one of the cross strokes of a musical note less than a quarter note in value
:something represented by a flag: as
:flagship
:an admiral functioning in his office of command
:nationality
:the nationality of registration of a ship or aircraft
:to signal with or as if with a flag
:to signal to stop flagged the train often used with down
:to mark or identify with or as if with a flag flagged potential problems in the proposal
:to call a penalty on :penalize a lineman flagged for being offside
:to hang loose without stiffness
:to become unsteady, feeble, or spiritless
:to decline in interest, attraction, or value flagging stock prices

entry.et: Middle English flagge turf, perhaps from Old Norse flaga slab; akin to Old English flōh chip

def.dt: :a hard evenly stratified stone that splits into flat pieces suitable for paving
:a piece of such stone
:to lay (as a pavement) with flags
:June 14 observed in various states in commemoration of the adoption in 1777 of the official United States flag
:a day on which charitable contributions are solicited in exchange for small flags
:a variation of football in which a player must remove a flag attached to the ballcarrier's clothing to stop the play
:registry of a merchant ship under a foreign flag in order to profit from less restrictive regulations

entry.et: from such officers being entitled to display a flag with one or more stars indicating rank

def.dt: :any of the officers in the navy or coast guard above captain compare general officer
